original_text: Jesus taught God's message to the people. He used many stories like these. He told the people as much as they could understand.
korean_text: 예수께서 이러한 많은 비유로 그들이 알아 들을 수 있는 대로 말씀을 가르치시되

sentences.original_text: Jesus taught God's message to the people
He used many stories like these
He told the people as much as they could understand
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 사람들이 이해할 수 있는 만큼만 말씀하셨습니다
